name: places/ChIJP6EvpqFZwokROZFirZ8Bs2E
formattedAddress: 1779 2nd Ave Apt 10a, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1779 2nd Ave Apt 10a, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Michelle is a wonderful piano teacher. She has been teaching my 10-year-old son Kai for the past 2 years. His favorite day of the week is the day he gets to go to his piano lesson with Ms. Michelle! She is calm and patient, fun-spirited, and adapted very quickly to Kai’s communication limitations. Michelle finds fun ways to teach note-reading, pays very close attention to what her students need, and tailors their lessons around overcoming their challenges and enhancing their strengths. She has done a marvelous job helping Kai understand dynamics and tweak his technique, continually feeds his love of music with just what he needs, and genuinely pushes him to reach his full potential on the keys. Allegria Piano’s recitals are always a treat with such intriguing, bold, and varied song choices; again a testament to how well Michelle knows her students’ abilities and styles. Kai always looks forward to the recitals and enjoys performing and seeing his peers perform. We're so very happy to be part of the Allegria family and applaud all they have done to bring joy to our lives :-)

originalText.text: We are so grateful to have Michelle as a piano teacher. She is patient, kind, focused, and creative. She offers a new perspective on how to approach and offer intention to well-loved pieces while offering new and interesting works to explore and learn. The act of making music is more than playing notes and that is something she teaches us with humility, talent, and joy! We HIGHLY recommend her instruction!

text.text: We are so grateful to have Michelle as a piano teacher. She is patient, kind, focused, and creative. originalText.text:
Michelle is a very talented teacher, an amazing musician and overall wonderful person. As a teacher Michelle is very patient makes me feel safe and secure enabling me to learn easily. I have progress very quickly working with her. She is great at breaking things down into smaller pieces when we come across something  I don’t understand. It’s clear in how she works with me that Michelle loves teaching music. I love that.

I always looking forward to my lessons with Michelle. We laugh and play and learn. It’s so much fun. I can’t think of another way to express my recommendation. She’s just great.

originalText.text: Michelle is great at assessing students abilities and interests and adjusts lessons to suit your needs. She is a passionate and patient teacher. Somehow, she manages to make music theory enjoyable to learn and as a student interested in songwriting, we are able to incorporate that aspect into the lessons as well!  She helped me prepare for my audition at Berklee College of Music. I could not have gotten in without her. I always look forward to coming home and studying with her on breaks!

originalText.text: Patient, inspiring and talented. Michelle has been working with our son for over a year now, and he's grown musically in ways we never imagined. She's adapted her approach to his learning style when necessary, and is helping him develop a deep love of  music...a lifelong gift. I can't recommend her highly enough.
